title: Experienced full stack Laravel/Angular developer for a 2-3 week project
snippet:
Looking for an experienced full stack developer for a 2-3 week project. You will work with a team of international experts for this project. This contract includes multiple sub-projects using Laravel & Angular to develop an API & interface to accommodate the collection of information about individual visitors to our website. 

Visitors will be comprised of and added to user profiles on our website. Information that needs to be stored to an individual user profile will be collected via allowed connections between social profiles and our website along with other local systems analytics. Visitor profile data will be assessable via an admin interface developed using Laravel and Angular JS 1.5. 

Must be experienced with Javascript, AngularJS, PHP, Laravel, GIT and Vagrant.

Please note we are creating a Rich Internet Application, not a website/blog/etc. We have specifications available for applicants to review upon request.
